message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider this price?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, however, the value of this product is truly significant. Could we meet halfway at $16,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
